name: VISION UNLTD. CREATIVE WORX GmbH
description:
VISION UNLTD. CREATIVE WORX is a full service and digital agency headquartered in Cologne and based in Belgrade and New York City.
We specialize in cross-media advertising, branding, B2C, and B2B consisting of two units: 

VISION UNLTD. focuses on strategy with core competencies in branding and online marketing. 
CREATIVE WORX acts operatively and handles tasks concerning design, interactive media and rich media content, and game production.
